The rendition of Maybe I’m Amazed is on the movie’s official soundtrack album, out today.

Dornan’s no stranger to music, of course: he was in the folk band Sons Of Jim until 2008.

His Maybe I’m Amazed is a straightforward piano cover, and Dornan’s voice sounds in very fine form indeed. It’s only 77 seconds long, though, so don’t get too attached.

Stream below.
